message:
I have been doing a bit of knockout code for quite long now, and only today I discovered the data-bind intellisense in VS2012. I looked to check whether it was Resharper or Web Essentials or so, but it turned out to be the December RC Update, described here:
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/webdev/archive/2012/12/13/knockout-intellisense-in-wte-1-2-rc.aspx
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Knockout Intellisense in Visual Studio 2012
caption: johnpapa.net
description: If you enjoy developing with Knockout.js, then youâ€™ll be glad to hear that support has been added for Knockout Intellisense in Visual Studio 2012! These features are pretty cool and will save...
